description: Mutation testing baseline for BNsyn critical modules

config.test_command: pytest -x -q -m 'not validation and not property and not benchmark'

scope.test_markers: not validation and not property and not benchmark

src/bnsyn/neuron/adex.py.note: Per-module breakdown requires manual mutmut analysis

src/bnsyn/plasticity/stdp.py.note: Per-module breakdown requires manual mutmut analysis

src/bnsyn/plasticity/three_factor.py.note: Per-module breakdown requires manual mutmut analysis

src/bnsyn/temperature/schedule.py.note: Per-module breakdown requires manual mutmut analysis
